Posts.Content: excited your port have been deported it just makes me more anxious to get started I just got imported 2/8 and start chemo in 2 days. Di
Posts.Title: I have been deported!

Posts.Content: I am new to this had a lumpectomy done 1/14 and 21 lymph nods taken out 3 positive. I am going in 2/8 for a port to be put in for 8 sessions of chemo followed by 6 1/2 weeks of radiation and so confused do I want to have more margin taken out or do I just want to have a mastectomy.
